specialMvp.name: Lakshmi
specialMvp.reason: For 3 wickets and Great catch of last batsman

specialMvp.name: Roshan
specialMvp.reason: For not breaking previous record and completing over.

specialMvp.name: Ankamma
specialMvp.reason: Ankamma for being able to see the ball while batting.

specialMentions: Lakshmi's wickets of Banerjee and Tanmay in first over
Swapnil's partnership of 74 runs with Tilak

specialMvp.name: Sai
specialMvp.reason: For taking Vivek & Azhar wickets in same over.

specialMentions: Banerjee's 42 of 26 and 6 runs of 2 overs
Ankamma's No Ball to Swamiji(WK) and comeback yorker next ball
Pritam's yorker to Banerjee and 14 of 8
Rishabh's friendly fire of 3 wickets [Last man standing]

specialMvp.name: Sanjana
specialMvp.reason: For taking Swamiji & Swapnil wickets in same over.

specialMentions: Vivek's all round performance: cameo of 31 of 10, 2/11 and 2 catches
Azhar's batting 34 of 20 and his most expensive over
Banerjee's spider man catch of Abin
Abin's team early bowling was tight.
Abin's team death bowling was good
Tanmay's got 4 catches and caught one gracefully on ground

specialMvp.name: Prem
specialMvp.reason: For wickets of Swamiji and Azhar in same over

specialMentions: Vivek's tight bowling, batting and three run outs.
Banerjee and Roshan finishing in style of Swamiji's over.

specialMvp.name: Swapnil
specialMvp.reason: For taking 2 wickets and for 2 catches

specialMentions: Tilak's team co-ordination between the wickets.
Swapnil's effort in rebuilding the partnership.
Abin's attempt to hit six on first ball resulting in golden duck.
Swamiji's and Roshan's hitting in middle overs.
Abin's first ball wicket of vivek's wicket
Swamiji's revenge on debu by hitting sixes back.
Swapnil's contribution to increase target by 22
Banerjee taking azhar and tilak wickets

specialMvp.name: Rahit
specialMvp.reason: For trying hard until last over

specialMentions: Abin and Teja continuing his duckout streak
Barnali taking azhar and swapnil wickets

specialMvp.name: Ankamma's team
specialMvp.reason: For bowling tight over and defending low score.

specialMentions: Rishab's fours and his team bowling with 0 extras
Sai's team comeback performance in bowling.

specialMvp.name: Ankamma's bowlers
specialMvp.reason: Full team bowling extremely tight overs.

specialMentions: Ankamma team defending low target to win the torunament
Abin's tight over and crucial runs
Teja's and Ankamma's wickets of main batsmen
Sai's team collapse after big win last match
Rishab's team supporting Sai's team so that they get chance to win tournament

specialMvp.name: Swapnil
specialMvp.reason: For his batting and effort to win.

specialMentions: Debu scoring most of team's runs
Azhar's bowling and effort to win
Match ending due to time out(10pm) and Rishabh team won by DRS

specialMvp.name: Swamiji
specialMvp.reason: For taking important wicket and finishing the match

specialMentions: Tanmay for bowling and fielding well
Swapnil's taking 4 wickets to get all out.
Abin's and Sai Ganesh crucial partnership of 45 runs in 31 balls
Prajakta's and Raghu's two wicket overs to collapse Swamiji's team.
Banerjee took his second life to win the match given by prem.

specialMvp.name: Roshan
specialMvp.reason: For taking and giving crucial runs

specialMentions: Collapse of batting lineup in Banerjee team
Abin's batting from first ball to last
Mahesh anna's first ball four.(ps thanks to Azhar)
Run outs in Swapnil team for last overs collapse
Praful's two main wicket over and crucial runs to finish the match

specialMvp.name: Abin and Sai Ganesh hitting
specialMvp.reason: Constant hitting from the team helped them get par score

specialMentions: Tilak's team bowling to get constant and crucial wickets
Swamiji team bowling to contain in death overs

specialMvp.name: Vivek
specialMvp.reason: For superfast batting of 46 runs in just 18 balls

specialMentions: Prafull's batting from first ball to last ball

specialMvp.name: Govinda
specialMvp.reason: For played 28 balls notout unforgotable innings

specialMvp.name: Abin
specialMvp.reason: For batting from the initial overs

specialMentions: Rishabh, Sai and Govinda's duck out
Sridev played for both teams, batting, bowling and keeping
Tanmay and Rishabh's golden duck out

specialMvp.name: Chhavi
specialMvp.reason: For finishing the batting line-up of opponent team

specialMentions: Banerjee's hattrick of 4 in tanmay's over
Game finishes with a no ball

specialMvp.name: Prem
specialMvp.reason: For 3 wickets and 1 runout in same over.

specialMentions: Ankamma's team's tight bowling and getting wickets continuously
Ashish, Chhavi, Sneha, Nilam and Sakshi's continuous duck out
Rishabh, Roshan and Sai Charan's duck out
Most of the bowler from Qasim's team got wicket
Debdutta, Milan and Vidita's 2 wicket to keep the match alive
In bowling Govinda, Milan and Prem tried to copy each other
Second Tied match in STEP history
Swamiji became the first player to reach 1000 runs in STEP
Fighting spirit from both team even after so many up's and down's
